metadata.title: CVE-2015-2091 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The authentication hook (mgs_hook_authz) in mod-gnutls 0.5.10 and earlierdoes not validate client certificates when "GnuTLSClientVerify require" isset, which allows remote attackers to spoof clients via a craftedcertificate.

criterions.comment: mod-gnutls: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
